name: Warm Marble
description:
Mobile Users: This game works on mobile! Hit "Run Game" to play in full screen : )

"...Ann approached the young superstar and asked if she could "feel his biceps." "Sure," Lee responded -- it was a request he'd received on numerous occasions -- tensing his arm and inviting her to check it out for herself. "My God!" she exclaimed, drawing her hand back instantly, "It's like feeling warm marble!" ~ source

Warm Marble is a historical Bruce Lee fan-fiction visual novel dating simulator. 

Enjoy : )

Built using Monogatari - a very cool in-browser visual novel engine.

Review are in:

"An interactive tour of Bruce Lee eroticism..." ~ Gavin
